original_text: And the people came to Moses and said, “We have sinned, for we have spoken against the Lord and against you. Pray to the Lord, that he take away the serpents from us.” So Moses prayed for the people.
korean_text: 백성이 모세에게 이르러 말하되 우리가 여호와와 당신을 향하여 원망함으로 범죄하였사오니 여호와께 기도하여 이 뱀들을 우리에게서 떠나게 하소서 모세가 백성을 위하여 기도하매

sentences.original_text: And the people came to Moses and said,
for we have spoken against the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 우리가 주를 거슬러 말했기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: that he take away the serpents from us.”
So Moses prayed for the people.
